metadata.description: When Fujimori enters college， he starts going to kendo class， five years after he quit during junior high school. It all started again with an invitation from the 'genius swordsman'， Sagimiya. Despite Fujimori’s nervous and formal attitude， Sagimiya doesn’t stay away. What could his true feelings for Fujimori be? The author’s unique and poetic style has attracted an army of fans. It’s a romantic boys-love kendo story!
metadata.name: Honey Sword (Yaoi Manga)
